credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Robert W. Van Boskerck
title: "From thence together we will love..."
description: Folio.  Spray of flowers, tulip and roses, three lines of verse and three below the flower motif, written by hand.  Floral embossed border, with Cupids in corners, with French inscritpions, also embossed.  Narrow color border.
name: Greeting card
